title: Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: Springbank, Alberta
content:
Photo submitted by Brett Wootton, “Hot, sunny afternoon roll through Springbank, Alberta.” We always love seeing photos from where you are riding and are happy to share them with our readers around the world here on the Pic Of The Day. Send in your pics with a description here.

The post Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: Springbank, Alberta appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Kristi Benedict
